 Bin Laden did not like Saddam Hussein because he was too sectarian. Bush kissed up to bin Laden once again and took our military out of Afghanistan so that the Taliban and Al-Qaeda would be totally free to regroup and Bush took out bin Laden's Number One Enemy in the Middle East, Saddam Hussein.
